const Post = ({ post }) => { const postObj = JSON.parse(post.data) return (
img

{post.user_name}

{post.user_username}

{"· " + post.date}

{postObj.user_name}

{postObj.title}

{postObj.ingredients && postObj.ingredients.length > 0 &&

{'Ingredientes: '}

{postObj.ingredients.map((ingredient, index) => (

{ingredient.quantity + " " + ingredient.unity + " " + ingredient.name}

))}
} {postObj.description &&

{'Descrição: '}

{postObj.description}

}
) } export default Post;
